analysis.description:
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#620-633) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(now > periodITO_endTime || periodITO_wei == periodITO_hardCapInWei)

Reentrancy in TripleAlphaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#556-600):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#565)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- periodITO_wei (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#576-578)
	- periodITO_wei (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#583-585)
	- periodPreITO_wei (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#571-572)

Reentrancy in TripleAlphaCrowdsale.refund (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#602-618):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender) > 0) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#608-609)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- received_ethers (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#613)
odd in TripleAlphaCrowdsale.calcAmountAt (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#526) is a local variable never initialiazed

TripleAlphaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#556-600) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#565)

TripleAlphaCrowdsale.refund (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#602-618) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.burn(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#614)

TripleAlphaCrowdsale.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#620-633) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting(true) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#626-628)
	-token.finishMinting(false) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#630-633)

Reentrancy in TripleAlphaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#556-600):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#565)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- received_ethers (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#586-588)

Reentrancy in TripleAlphaCrowdsale.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#620-633):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(! token.mintingFinished()) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#623-625)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- refundAllowed (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#629)

TripleAlphaCrowdsale.setPeriodPreITO_startTime (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#480-493) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < _at) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#488)
	- require(bool)(periodPreITO_startTime == 0 || block.timestamp < periodPreITO_startTime) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#481-486)

TripleAlphaCrowdsale.setPeriodITO_startTime (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#495-515) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(periodITO_startTime == 0 || block.timestamp < periodITO_startTime) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#498-499)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < _at) (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#503-505)

TripleAlphaCrowdsale.minimalTokens should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#315-316)
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.periodITO_mainCapInUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#356)
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.periodITO_period should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#356-358)
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.periodITO_softCapInUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#350-353)
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.periodITO_tokenPriceUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#362-363)
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.periodPreITO_mainCapInUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#322-325)
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.periodPreITO_period should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#327-328)
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.periodPreITO_tokenPriceUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#329-331)
TripleAlphaCrowdsale.rateETHUSD should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x78e24e3c9c81d75b22dd1326987089ce537886e9.sol#313)
